snippet: Mr. Wilson had a hand in composing “Love Child” by the Supremes and numerous other hits by the likes of Stevie Wonder and Marvin Gaye before becoming a minister in Los Angeles.
abstract: Frank Wilson, former producer and songwriter for Motown Records, dies at age 71.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Wilson had a hand in composing “Love Child” by the Supremes and numerous other hits by the likes of Stevie Wonder and Marvin Gaye before becoming a minister in Los Angeles.

headline.seo: Frank Wilson, Motown Songwriter and Producer, Dies at 71
headline.main: Frank Wilson, Motown Songwriter and Producer, Dies at 71
